game.name: Mythokyn Nightfall
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Chaos erupts on your Warden Initiation night as comets rain from the sky. Pick a starting Mythokyn to aid you as you traverse through the chaos of the night, fighting and capturing Mythokyn on your way back to the safety of the city of Gladehaven in this creature-collecting action roguelike game
